pkgmetadata.longdescription: magic-import============Import python object from string and return the reference of the object. The object can be a class, instance, variable and anything else, and can be from class, instance, module, global/local environment.Install-------:: pip install magic-importUsage-----:: from magic_import import import_from_string listdir = import_from_string("os.listdir") files = listdir(".")
